verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>, to bring to remembrance <WH2142> <WH8687>. Make haste, O 'Elohim <WH430>, to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> me; make haste <WH2363> <WH8798> to help <WH5833> me, O YY <WH3068>.

Let them be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> and confounded <WH2659> <WH8799> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> after my soul <WH5315>: let them be turned <WH5472> <WH8735> backward <WH268>, and put to confusion <WH3637> <WH8735>, that desire <WH2655> my hurt <WH7451>.
Let them be turned back <WH7725> <WH8799> for a reward <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> that say <WH559> <WH8802>, Aha <WH1889>, aha <WH1889>.

Let all those that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> thee rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> and be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> in thee: and let such as love <WH157> <WH8802> thy salvation <WH3444> say <WH559> <WH8799> continually <WH8548>, Let 'Elohim <WH430> be magnified <WH1431> <WH8799>.

But I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>: make haste <WH2363> <WH8798> unto me, O 'Elohim <WH430>: thou art my help <WH5828> and my deliverer <WH6403> <WH8764>; O YY <WH3068>, make no tarrying <WH309> <WH8762>.
